product_name: Tetley Green Tea, Lemon and Honey, 100 Tea Bags: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_body: Instant Weight-Loss using green tea is just a fiction and not a fact.Brands claiming the same is just another false promise made for marketing their products!!Research proves many benefits of green tea but in the LONG TERM. Nothing instant about it.My daily routine included having 2 cups of this green tea for a prolonged term of 2 months. Out of my 100 servings I never experienced that refreshing kick the brand promises and rather the taste is really disgusting. Let's admit, we all drink green tea like medicine.Rather than trusting condensed soiled up leaves in a tea bag(picture attached). I recommend switching to green tea leaves as you can see what your drinking.I'm personally switching over to coffee as it delivers the required punch to get me going...||Wish you a Safe and Worthy purchase||

reviews.review_title: Best flavored green tea in the market.
reviews.review_body: Tetley is one of the leading brand for tea and we all know the benefits of having a cup of green tea which helps to rejuvenate yourself throughout your day. One thing that I don't like about normal green was it flavour because it taste Pathetic like you are having look wram water but thanks to Tetley flavored green tea  now I can have it everyday and get benefits of it. I prefer Tetley lemon honey green tea over ginger mint one. Tetley lemon honey has a very sublime taste which is not very strong to the nose but still you can sense it while having a sip. I bought this 100 packs tea bag for 400/- with a good discount from Amazon. So technically it tea bag cost me 4/- which is I feel very cost friendly. One I don't like about bthe product is it's packaging. Box is not very strudy. So if you want to have the benefits of green tea along with a nice flavor please go for it. I would surely recommend everyone to go for  this product.
Wonderful taste and quality of tea is good.The  aroma is good and is one of best green tea available in market.buying pack of 100 is good deal in terms of price.

Having tied different brands and varieties of green teas, I am thinking of sticking to this 'Tetley Lemon Honey' flavour. This has a very rich and soothing taste. One can easily make out the flavours of lemon and honey even by the smell once you pour some hot water to the cup dipped with this tea..The tastes vary person to person, hence I'd not say whether I'd recommend it to others or not, but for now it has satisfied me and  I'm sticking with this tea for my daily usage.

reviews.review_title: Muje ashi nahi lagi Tetley green tea
reviews.review_body: Lipton green tea is best than Tetley green tea , Tetley green tea taste is little strong,iss vich lemon da flavour jyada hai,sachets ko open krna v muskil hai,packing bakwash hai, so always purchase Lipton green tea

i am a sucker for green tea which one can have easily,  a dip and boiled water is all we need. i have tried all kinda variety, but tetley is the best amongst all. in this the mint flavour is the favourite. go for it. amazon has it at amazing prices.

reviews.review_title: Great flavor, not so good packaging
reviews.review_body: PROS1. Lemon and honey is the best flavor for a cup of green tea just before sleep2. Cheaper than in storeCONS1. The box Arrived in a crush state and i had to store the tea bags separately in a container to maintain freshness

Good as Morning Starter. Got plenty of benefits. Lemon and Honey the flavour is subtle and just right in a Mug of steaming hot water. You can have it any time of the day.Great Delivery but Poor Packaging oflate by Amazon
